alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit; Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 3:44PM HST until December 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF HAWAII AND MAUI COUNTIES UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... .Especially breezy trades will gradually weaken by Saturday. The strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas between mountains. ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 40 mph with localized gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Haleakala and the Big Island summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
